<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Asset Funding Types"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/funding/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the catalog of funding sources that can be assigned to assets. Funding types define budget categories like Title I, E-Rate, General Fund, or Grant funding.

**Workflow Example**
1. Call [GET /api/v1.0/assets/funding/types](/docs/api/assets/list-asset-funding-types) to retrieve available funding sources.
2. Extract `Items[].FundingTypeId` for the appropriate budget category.
3. Include `FundingTypeId` when creating assets via [POST /api/v1.0/assets/new](/docs/api/assets/create-asset) or updating via [POST /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/update-asset).

**Common Use Cases**
- Populate funding source dropdowns in asset forms
- Generate financial reports grouped by funding type
- Track E-Rate or grant-funded device purchases

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
